    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.support.v4.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, uk.co.senab.actionbarpulltorefresh.library.listeners.OnRefreshListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActivityForSearchingInBackground, ActivityForSearchingTumOnline, RoomFinderActivity

    public abstract class ActivityForSearching
extends ProgressActivity
    Generic class for searching. Provides basic functions for a SearchView and typical processes related to search.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ActivityForSearching

        public ActivityForSearching(int layoutId,
                    java.lang.String auth,
                    int minLen)
        Initializes an activity for searching. The xml layout must include an error_layout and a progress_layout. A PullToRefreshLayout called ptr_layout is required if the activity should support PullToRefresh method
        Parameters:
        layoutId - Resource id of the xml layout that should be used to inflate the activity
        auth - Authority for search suggestions declared in manifest file
        minLen - Minimum text length that has to be entered by the user before a search quest can be submitted

      • openSearch

        public void openSearch()
        Expands the Search-ActionView on activity startup, so that the user can immediately start typing. Only has an effect if it is called during onCreate(android.os.Bundle)} or FragmentActivity.onResume()} method.
